CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Rating_hz__c), "1", IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_100.gif", "rating"), "2", IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_200.gif", "rating"), "3", IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_300.gif", "rating"), "4", IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "rating"), "5", IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "rating"), IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_000.gif", "rating") )
